      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <h1>preflight.css</h1>
        </td>
        <td class="code highlight"></td>
      </tr>
    
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-1" id="section-1"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Prevent padding and border from affecting element width. (https://github.com/mozdevs/cssremedy/issues/4)</li>
<li>Remove default margins and padding</li>
<li>Reset all borders.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
*,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::after</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::before</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::backdrop</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::file-selector-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-sizing</span>: border-box; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> solid; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 3 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-2" id="section-2"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Use a consistent sensible line-height in all browsers.</li>
<li>Prevent adjustments of font size after orientation changes in iOS.</li>
<li>Use a more readable tab size.</li>
<li>Use the user's configured <code>sans</code> font-family by default.</li>
<li>Use the user's configured <code>sans</code> font-feature-settings by default.</li>
<li>Use the user's configured <code>sans</code> font-variation-settings by default.</li>
<li>Disable tap highlights on iOS.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">html</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:host</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">line-height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1.5</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">-webkit-text-size-adjust</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">tab-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 3 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-family</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">--theme</span>(
    --default-font-family,
    ui-sans-serif,
    system-ui,
    sans-serif,
    <span class="hljs-string">'Apple Color Emoji'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'Segoe UI Emoji'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'Segoe UI Symbol'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'Noto Color Emoji'</span>
  ); <span class="hljs-comment">/* 4 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-feature-settings</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">--theme</span>(--default-font-feature-settings, normal); <span class="hljs-comment">/* 5 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-variation-settings</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">--theme</span>(--default-font-variation-settings, normal); <span class="hljs-comment">/* 6 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">-webkit-tap-highlight-color</span>: transparent; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 7 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-3" id="section-3"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Add the correct height in Firefox.</li>
<li>Correct the inheritance of border color in Firefox. (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=190655)</li>
<li>Reset the default border style to a 1px solid border.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">hr</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-top-width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 3 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-4" id="section-4"></a>
</div>
<p>Add the correct text decoration in Chrome, Edge, and Safari.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">abbr</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:where(</span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[title]</span>) {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">-webkit-text-decoration</span>: underline dotted;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-decoration</span>: underline dotted;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-5" id="section-5"></a>
</div>
<p>Remove the default font size and weight for headings.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h1</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h2</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h3</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h4</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h5</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">h6</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: inherit;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-weight</span>: inherit;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-6" id="section-6"></a>
</div>
<p>Reset links to optimize for opt-in styling instead of opt-out.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">a</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: inherit;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">-webkit-text-decoration</span>: inherit;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-decoration</span>: inherit;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-7" id="section-7"></a>
</div>
<p>Add the correct font weight in Edge and Safari.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">b</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">strong</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-weight</span>: bolder;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-8" id="section-8"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Use the user's configured <code>mono</code> font-family by default.</li>
<li>Use the user's configured <code>mono</code> font-feature-settings by default.</li>
<li>Use the user's configured <code>mono</code> font-variation-settings by default.</li>
<li>Correct the odd <code>em</code> font sizing in all browsers.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">code</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">kbd</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">samp</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">pre</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-family</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">--theme</span>(
    --default-mono-font-family,
    ui-monospace,
    SFMono-Regular,
    Menlo,
    Monaco,
    Consolas,
    <span class="hljs-string">'Liberation Mono'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'Courier New'</span>,
    monospace
  ); <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-feature-settings</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">--theme</span>(--default-mono-font-feature-settings, normal); <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-variation-settings</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">--theme</span>(--default-mono-font-variation-settings, normal); <span class="hljs-comment">/* 3 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1em</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 4 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-9" id="section-9"></a>
</div>
<p>Add the correct font size in all browsers.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">small</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">80%</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-10" id="section-10"></a>
</div>
<p>Prevent <code>sub</code> and <code>sup</code> elements from affecting the line height in all browsers.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">sub</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">sup</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span>: <span class="hljs-number">75%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">line-height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">vertical-align</span>: baseline;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">sub</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">bottom</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">0.25em</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">sup</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">0.5em</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-11" id="section-11"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Remove text indentation from table contents in Chrome and Safari. (https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=999088, https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=201297)</li>
<li>Correct table border color inheritance in all Chrome and Safari. (https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=935729, https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=195016)</li>
<li>Remove gaps between table borders by default.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">table</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-indent</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-color</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-collapse</span>: collapse; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 3 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-12" id="section-12"></a>
</div>
<p>Use the modern Firefox focus style for all focusable elements.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:-moz-focusring</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">outline</span>: auto;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

        </td>

          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">progress</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">vertical-align</span>: baseline;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

        </td>

<span class="hljs-selector-tag">summary</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: list-item;
}

        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-15" id="section-15"></a>
</div>
<p>Make lists unstyled by default.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">ol</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">ul</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">menu</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">list-style</span>: none;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-16" id="section-16"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Make replaced elements <code>display: block</code> by default. (https://github.com/mozdevs/cssremedy/issues/14)</li>
<li>Add <code>vertical-align: middle</code> to align replaced elements more sensibly by default. (https://github.com/jensimmons/cssremedy/issues/14#issuecomment-634934210)
This can trigger a poorly considered lint error in some tools but is included by design.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">svg</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">video</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">canvas</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">audio</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">iframe</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">embed</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">object</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: block; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">vertical-align</span>: middle; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-17" id="section-17"></a>
</div>
<p>Constrain images and videos to the parent width and preserve their intrinsic aspect ratio. (https://github.com/mozdevs/cssremedy/issues/14)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">video</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: auto;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-18" id="section-18"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Inherit font styles in all browsers.</li>
<li>Remove border radius in all browsers.</li>
<li>Remove background color in all browsers.</li>
<li>Ensure consistent opacity for disabled states in all browsers.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">select</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">optgroup</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">textarea</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::file-selector-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-feature-settings</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-variation-settings</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">letter-spacing</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: transparent; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 3 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">opacity</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 4 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-19" id="section-19"></a>
</div>
<p>Restore default font weight.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:where(select</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:is(</span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[multiple]</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-attr">[size]</span>)) <span class="hljs-selector-tag">optgroup</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">font-weight</span>: bolder;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">

<p>Restore indentation.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:where(select</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:is(</span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[multiple]</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-attr">[size]</span>)) <span class="hljs-selector-tag">optgroup</span> <span class="hljs-selector-tag">option</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding-inline-start</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-21" id="section-21"></a>
</div>
<p>Restore space after button.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::file-selector-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-inline-end</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4px</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-22" id="section-22"></a>
</div>
<p>Reset the default placeholder opacity in Firefox. (https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/issues/3300)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::placeholder</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">opacity</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-23" id="section-23"></a>
</div>
<p>Set the default placeholder color to a semi-transparent version of the current text color in browsers that do not
crash when using <code>color-mix()</code> with <code>currentcolor</code>. (https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/issues/17194)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-keyword">@supports</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> (<span class="hljs-attribute">-webkit-appearance:</span> -apple-pay-button)) /* <span class="hljs-keyword">Not</span> Safari */ <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span>
  (<span class="hljs-attribute">contain-intrinsic-size:</span> <span class="hljs-number">1px</span>) /* Safari <span class="hljs-number">17</span>+ */ {
  <span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::placeholder</span> {
    <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">color-mix</span>(in oklab, currentcolor <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>, transparent);
  }
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-24" id="section-24"></a>
</div>
<p>Prevent resizing textareas horizontally by default.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">textarea</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">resize</span>: vertical;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-25" id="section-25"></a>
</div>
<p>Remove the inner padding in Chrome and Safari on macOS.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-search-decoration</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">-webkit-appearance</span>: none;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-26" id="section-26"></a>
</div>
<ol>
<li>Ensure date/time inputs have the same height when empty in iOS Safari.</li>
<li>Ensure text alignment can be changed on date/time inputs in iOS Safari.</li>
</ol>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-date-and-time-value</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">min-height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>lh; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 1 */</span>
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-align</span>: inherit; <span class="hljs-comment">/* 2 */</span>
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-27" id="section-27"></a>
</div>
<p>Prevent height from changing on date/time inputs in macOS Safari when the input is set to <code>display: block</code>.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: inline-flex;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-28" id="section-28"></a>
</div>
<p>Remove excess padding from pseudo-elements in date/time inputs to ensure consistent height across browsers.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-fields-wrapper</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}

<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-year-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-month-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-day-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-hour-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-minute-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-second-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-millisecond-field</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-datetime-edit-meridiem-field</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">padding-block</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-29" id="section-29"></a>
</div>
<p>Center dropdown marker shown on inputs with paired <code>&lt;datalist&gt;</code>s in Chrome. (https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/issues/18499)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-calendar-picker-indicator</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">line-height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-30" id="section-30"></a>
</div>
<p>Remove the additional <code>:invalid</code> styles in Firefox. (https://github.com/mozilla/gecko-dev/blob/2f9eacd9d3d995c937b4251a5557d95d494c9be1/layout/style/res/forms.css#L728-L737)</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:-moz-ui-invalid</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: none;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-31" id="section-31"></a>
</div>
<p>Correct the inability to style the border radius in iOS Safari.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:where(</span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[type=<span class="hljs-string">'button'</span>]</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-attr">[type=<span class="hljs-string">'reset'</span>]</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-attr">[type=<span class="hljs-string">'submit'</span>]</span>),
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::file-selector-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">appearance</span>: button;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-32" id="section-32"></a>
</div>
<p>Correct the cursor style of increment and decrement buttons in Safari.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-inner-spin-button</span>,
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">::-webkit-outer-spin-button</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: auto;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>
    
      <tr>
        <td class="docs">
          <div class="pilwrap">
  <a class="pilcrow" href="#section-33" id="section-33"></a>
</div>
<p>Make elements with the HTML hidden attribute stay hidden by default.</p>

        </td>
        <td class="code highlight">
          <pre class="css">
<span class="hljs-selector-attr">[hidden]</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:where(</span><span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:not(</span><span class="hljs-selector-attr">[hidden=<span class="hljs-string">'until-found'</span>]</span>)) {
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: none <span class="hljs-meta">!important</span>;
}

</pre>
        </td>
      </tr>

</table>

  </div>
